name: Dungeon (Panumas Kansitthichok)
description:
Talented adventurers want more challenges. from receiving quests from Guild to find challenges But he got through it and wanted more and more difficult things. until the end of the quest and reached the cursed treasure treasury Let's see if he gets swallowed up by the Treasury's curse or he becomes the owner of that card.
Play on WebGL in fullscreen.

How to Play


Press the W,A,S,D key to Walk. 
Press the Spacebar to Jump.
Press the LShift to Run.
Press the Left Click to Attack.

Press the Right Click to Use Special Attack

Tell us what you think about this Game!
